name: Mr. Blob
description:
This is a skilled based platformer game. 

The project is made up in python and pygame.

The game its about a mysterious character that is trying to save his village and his people.

CONTROLS:

  1.  "a" and "d" to move
  2.  "space" to jump
  3.  "r" to restart
  4.  "f" to toogle fullscreen
  5.  "mouse click" to attack
  6.  "shift" to slide
  7.   (for more information you could press the "controls" button in the game)
